Articles.Content: Not meant to be starting rumors or anything. But a genuine discussion (and question). When do you think (or when is) the 0.24 update meant to be coming out?
prediction? next-next tuesday. the devnotes have been progressing well. this week i am hoping to hear that e word (expirementals), and thusly the week after that might be release.

You folks know the rules. No asking for release dates. The only thing that ever comes of it is speculation and arguing, usually pointlessly. 0.24 still has to go through a rigorous QA and another Experimentals stage before it will see the light of day, so even if they finish up what they wanted to do tomorrow, it would still be a few weeks before it got through to y'all.

/thread.
